author: DTrombett
description: A Node.js library to interact with the Clash Royale API
name: apiroyale

scripts.release:major: npm test && npm run build && npm version major -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm test && npm run build && npm version minor -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm test && npm run build && npm version patch -m "chore(release): %s" && git push && npm publish
